document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Agrilus raapi Kerremans, 1900
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “Ile Nias”. Type specimens : Lectotype designated by Jendek (2007) .

Agrilus amatus Kerremans, 1912
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “[Borneo] Sarawak : Kuching”. Type specimens: Lectotype designated by Jendek (2007) .

Agrilus benguetensis
Fisher, 1921
. Described from 1 specimen (HTM). Type locality: “Baguio, Benguet [prov.], Luzon”. Type specimens : Holotype ♀ (USNM): “Baguio Benguet Baker [p] \ Type No. [p] 51458 [h] U. S. N. M. [p] [red label] \ Holotype [p] [red ink] Agrilus benguetensis FISHER [h] [white label with red border]”.

Agrilus corporaali Obenberger, 1922
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “ Sumatra or.: Brastagi”. Type specimens . Lectotype designated by Jendek (2007) .

Agrilus klossi
Fisher, 1930
. Described from 2 specimen (s) ( Holotype & PT). Type locality: “Lubok Tamang,
3,500 feet
, Pahang , Federated Malay States”.
Type specimens:
Holotype sex not examined (USNM): “ Pahang , F. M. S. Lubok Tamang [p] 3500 [h] ft. [p] 24th [h] June, 1923 H. M. Pendlebury [p] \ TypeNo [p] 57415 [h] U. S. N. M. [p] [red label] \ Agrilus klossi Fisher [h]”.
